about_the_game:
"No longer human" is a high-energy manic action game with expressive, anarchic combat that encourages aggressive and stylish play. Set in the derelict warrens of a cybergothic shitworld, you assume the role of Tsunono– a discarded vocaloid idol re-emerging from a decade long exile to destroy the world.

Computer-interfacing neurotechnology crosses into ubiquity at the end of history. Reality is rapidly obsolescing. Your ghost peels its skin off to search for an exit; evacuation cross-cut by strobing white as your corpse splays the static. Something pulling. Zero hour closing in.

Welcome to the pit.

content_descriptors.notes: Stylized depictions of violence, dismemberment, sexual themes, self-harm and profanity.
